mapper.select: select count(*) from collect where user_id = #{userId, jdbcType=INTEGER} and song_id = #{songId, jdbcType=INTEGER} ;
mapper.insert: insert into collect (user_id, `type`, song_id, song_list_id, create_time) values (#{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{type,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{songId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{songListId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
